Package com.jcoinche.rules

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jcoinche.rules.Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a card by defining all of its characteristics. A card has a value and a color. The value of a card goes from the Seven to the Ace. The color of a card is either Spade, Heart, Club or Diamond.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    uberti_l, grella_c
